name: Snakes (Bruno Benicio)
description:
Play the classic Snake against an AI!

See if you can make your snake bigger than your opponent's.

Multiple game modes:

  • Easy: the snakes move slower and the AI is dumber.
  • Medium: the snakes move at a nice pace and the AI makes some mistakes.
  • Hard: the AI rarely makes mistakes.
  • Evolving: starts out easy and becomes harder.

Control your snake with WASD or the arrow keys.
